author: mbenson
msg: upgrade to 1.0.6.GA tck, which we still pass

author: sf
msg: Fix segfault with Solaris LDAP SDK when enabling ldaps.
Enable SSL by passing secure=1 to apr_ldap_init instead of calling
This change carefully avoids any change of behavior on non-Solaris LDAP SDKs.

author: minfrin
msg: mod_session: Use apr_status_t as a return code across the mod_session API,
clarify where we ignore errors and why.

author: mbenson
msg: fix tck breakage, adding some extras tests into our own suite

author: sf
msg: Fix segfault with Solaris LDAP SDK when enabling ldaps.
Enable SSL by passing secure=1 to apr_ldap_init instead of calling
This change carefully avoids any change of behavior on non-Solaris LDAP SDKs.
